text: @senatemajldr The opportunity was impeachment. You blocked it. We knew about this deadly pandemic in December. Instead of using that time to prepare our nation Trump called it a hoax and attacked Democrats. You are partly responsible for the additional unnecessary deaths. #MassacreMitch
